A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Brought a tear to my eye! A great farewell to Luke Skywalker. I can't help but wonder how all this will resolve. With all the plot twists from this movie it wouldn't surprise me if the Empire ends up winning. The action sequences were great and reminiscent of the earlier films and the inclusion of alien puppets instead of CGI aliens was a refreshing nod towards the original trilogy as well.
